IMPORT_DATA.TITLE: Import Data
IMPORT_DATA.TITLE_DESC: Choose a xlxs file to import
IMPORT_DATA.NAME: Name
IMPORT_DATA.REGISTER_INSTRUCTIONS: For data registration on system, by means of Excel spreadsheet, upload the .xlsx files and use the template according to the examples below (pay attention to the columns and titles).
IMPORT_DATA.GEOFENCE_TYPE_INSTRUCTION: Type of contour for the Check Point. Choose 'c' or 'p', respectively for types Circle or Polygon. Mandatory. The values must be in lowercase.
IMPORT_DATA.COORDINATES_INSTRUCTION: If the check point is a circle, the value must inform latitude and longitude from center of the circle as [latitude, longitude], e.g.: [11.222, 33.444]. If check point is a polygon, the value must inform a list of latitudes and longitudes as [[latitude, longitude], [latitude, longitude],...], e.g.: [[11.222, 33.444], [11.222, 33.333], ...].
IMPORT_DATA.RADIUS_INSTRUCTION: For a circle, the radius of the check point is needed. Mandatory.
IMPORT_DATA.NAME_INSTRUCTION: Check point name. Mandatory. Minimum of 5 and max. 50 characters alphanumeric
IMPORT_DATA.ADDRESS_INSTRUCTION: Complete address of the check point. Mandatory.
IMPORT_DATA.COMPANY_INSTRUCTION: Name of the company to which the check point is related. Mandatory.
IMPORT_DATA.DUNS_INSTRUCTION: Company id code to what company is associated. Max 30 characters alphanumeric. Optional.
IMPORT_DATA.CHOOSE_A_FILE: Choose a xlxs file to import

PACKINGS_DESCRIPTION.SERIAL: Packaging serial number. Mandatory. Minimum of 2 and max. 30 characters alphanumeric
PACKINGS_DESCRIPTION.TAG: Device TAG number. Mandatory. Minimum of 4 and max. 50 characters alphanumeric.
PACKINGS_DESCRIPTION.VERSION: Device version. Mandatory. Maximum 30 characters alphanumeric.
PACKINGS_DESCRIPTION.MANUFACTORER: Packaging manufacturer. Mandatory. Minimum of 2 and maximum 30 alphanumeric characters
PACKINGS_DESCRIPTION.OBSERVATIONS: Notes about the packaging. Optional. Maximum of 140 characters alphanumeric
PACKINGS_DESCRIPTION.TYPE_DESCRIPTION: Packaging description. Mandatory. Max 50 characters alphanumeric
PACKINGS_DESCRIPTION.PROJECT: Project name to which the packaging is related. Mandatory.

COMPANIES_DESCRIPTION.TYPE: Check point type. It may be 'owner' or 'client'. Mandatory.
COMPANIES_DESCRIPTION.NAME: Company name. Mandatory. Minimum of 5 and max 50 characters alphanumeric
COMPANIES_DESCRIPTION.PHONE: Company phone number. Optional. Only numeric characters.
COMPANIES_DESCRIPTION.CNPJ: Company Registration Number. Optional. Only numeric characters.
COMPANIES_DESCRIPTION.STREET: Company street. Optional. Max. 60 characters alphanumeric.
COMPANIES_DESCRIPTION.CEP: Company ZIP Code, Optional. Only numeric characters.
COMPANIES_DESCRIPTION.CITY: Company city. Optional. Max 60 characters alphanumeric
COMPANIES_DESCRIPTION.UF: Company state. Optional. Maximum 2 characters alphanumeric.

ERROR.NOT_IMPORTED_LINES: These lines have not been updated from Excel

REGISTER.CORRECT_CONTROL_POINT_BUT_NEW: Attention! These records are correct, but do not correspond to a Control Point in the database. Do you want to proceed with the registration?
